description: An Azure Managed Application View Definition.
title: View Definition

___description.description: The description of the overview blade.

___version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

___header.description: The header value of the overview blade.

___displayName.description: The displayed title of the view.

___commands.description: The array of toolbar buttons of the overview blade.

___icon.description: The icon of the command button.

___displayName.description: The displayed name of the command button.

___createUIDefinition.description: Create UI Definition schema for command.

___optional.description: If true, the column will not be displayed in a view by default.

___key.description: The key of the property to display in a view. If nested, use dot as delimiter.

___displayName.description: The display name of the property to display in a view.

___chartType.description: The visualization to use for this chart. (Defaults to line chart)

___metrics.description: The metrics to plot on this chart.

___aggregationType.description: The aggregation type to use for this metric.

___resourceTagFilter.description: The resource tags (OR'd) for which metrics would be displayed. This is on top of resource type filter.

___namespace.description: Additional information to use when determining the correct metrics provider.

___resourceType.description: The resource type for which metrics would be displayed.

___displayName.description: The displayed title of the chart.

_88CustomResources.description: A configuration of a visualization for CustomResourceCollection.

___version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

___createUIDefinition.description: Create UI Definition schema for create custom resource command.

___displayName.description: The displayed title of the view.

___commands.description: The array of toolbar buttons of the CustomResourceCollection blade.

___icon.description: The icon of the command button.

___displayName.description: The displayed name of the command button.

___createUIDefinition.description: Create UI Definition schema for command.

___columns.description: The array of columns of the custom resource.

___optional.description: If true, the column will not be displayed in a view by default.

___key.description: The key of the property to display in a view. If nested, use dot as delimiter.

___displayName.description: The display name of the property to display in a view.

___aggregationType.description: The aggregation type to use for this metric.

___resourceTagFilter.description: The resource tags (OR'd) for which metrics would be displayed. This is on top of resource type filter.

___namespace.description: Additional information to use when determining the correct metrics provider.

___resourceType.description: The resource type for which metrics would be displayed.

___icon.description: The icon of the command button.

___displayName.description: The displayed name of the command button.

___createUIDefinition.description: Create UI Definition schema for command.

___version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

___displayName.description: The displayed menu item of the view.

___charts.description: The array of charts of the metrics blade.

___chartType.description: The visualization to use for this chart. (Defaults to line chart)

___metrics.description: The metrics to plot on this chart.

___displayName.description: The displayed title of the chart.

___description.description: The description of the overview blade.

___version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

___header.description: The header value of the overview blade.

___displayName.description: The displayed title of the view.

___commands.description: The array of toolbar buttons of the overview blade.

___version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

___displayName.description: The displayed menu item of the view.

___charts.description: The array of charts of the metrics blade.

$eref.description: A configuration of a visualization for CustomResourceCollection.

___version.description: The version of the platform used to render the view.

___createUIDefinition.description: Create UI Definition schema for create custom resource command.

___displayName.description: The displayed title of the view.

___commands.description: The array of toolbar buttons of the CustomResourceCollection blade.

___columns.description: The array of columns of the custom resource.

___contentVersion.description: A 4 number format for the version number of the view file. For example, 1.0.0.0.
